greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of twice-partitions of n with no repeated partitions.
comment: a(n) is the number of sequences of distinct integer partitions whose sums are weakly decreasing and add up to n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0, add(j!*
